nodes.connectors

类 NodeRegistreConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • nodes.connectors.NodeRegistreConnector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, java.rmi.Remote, RegistrationCI

    public class NodeRegistreConnector
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements RegistrationCI
    The class NodeRegistreConnector implements the connector between the sensor node component and the registration component.

    Description

    The connector implements the RegistrationCI interface and delegates the calls to the registration component.

      • registered

        public boolean registered(java.lang.String nodeIdentifier)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: RegistrationCI
        return true if nodeIdentifier corresponds to a already registered sensor node.

        Contract

         pre     nodeIdentifier != null && !nodeIdentifier.isEmpty()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        指定者:
        registered 在接口中 RegistrationCI
        参数:
        nodeIdentifier - a node identifier to be tested.
        返回:
        true if nodeIdentifier corresponds to a already registered sensor node.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • register

        public java.util.Set<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI> register(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.NodeInfoI nodeInfo)
                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: RegistrationCI
        register the new node and return a set of nodes information to which this new node can connect given its range and the range of the returned nodes.

        Contract

         pre     nodeInfo != null && !registered(nodeInfo.nodeIdentifier())
 post    return.stream().allMatch(n -> n != null)
 post    ret.stream().allMatch(n -> n.nodeIdentifier().equals(nodeInfo.nodeIdentifier()))
 post    ret.stream().allMatch(n -> nodeInfo.nodePosition().distance(n.nodePosition()) > nodeInfo.nodeRange() && nodeInfo.nodePosition().distance(n.nodePosition()) > n.nodeRange())
        指定者:
        register 在接口中 RegistrationCI
        参数:
        nodeInfo - the node information of the new node.
        返回:
        a set of already registered nodes to which the new node must connect.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

                                                                              Direction d)
                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: RegistrationCI
        find a new neighbour for the given node in the given direction and return its connection info, or null if none exists.

        Contract

         pre     true        // no precondition.
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        指定者:
        findNewNeighbour 在接口中 RegistrationCI
        参数:
        nodeInfo - sensor node seeking for a new neighbour.
        d - direction in which the neighbour is sought.
        返回:
        the node information of a new neighbour in the required direction or null if none is found.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
